events.name: Google Hash Code Hub
events.description:
We‚Äôll be hosting a hub at the University of Hildesheim for the Online Qualification Round of Hash Code, a team programming competition organized by Google.

Google‚Äôs team-based programming competition, Hash Code, allows you to share your skills and connect with other coders as you work together to solve a problem modeled off a real Google engineering challenge! In small teams of two to four, coders all over the world will tackle the first problem through an Online Qualification Round. Though this round is hosted online, teams can come together to compete side-by-side in locally coordinated Hash Code hubs. The top teams from this round are invited to join us at an international Google office for our annual Hash Code Final Round.

If you‚Äôre interested in joining our hub, find a team (2 to 4 people) and be sure you all register at https://codingcompetitions.withgoogle.com/hashcode/
You‚Äôll then need to select [GDG Uni-Hildesheim] from the list of hubs in the Judge System.

For More Information

https://codingcompetitions.withgoogle.com/hashcode/rulesandterms

events.name: Google Cloud Study Jams- ML,IoT
events.description:
A Community Event
Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers. This is a great opportunity to learn something in person. These training will give you a specific skill they can use for personal development or career advancement.

Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning. Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete with any labs you want.

You can choose any of our recommended tracks to run with your community: Machine Learning, Kubernetes, Certification, IoT, and Security.

https://www.qwiklabs.com/quests/34

https://www.qwiklabs.com/quests/32

https://www.qwiklabs.com/quests/49

After the session, attendees can continue taking labs to earn Google Cloud badges.

If you have used Qwiklabs before, great! Make sure you know your password. If you have never used Qwiklabs before, save time by creating an account for yourself prior to the class at:
https://google.qwiklabs.com/users/sign_up
(creating an account is free).

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

events.name: Do-it-yourself  Artificial Intelligence - Google AIY Kit
events.description:
The AIY Vision Kit from Google lets you build your own intelligent camera that can see and recognize objects using machine learning. All of this fits in a handy little cardboard cube, powered by a Raspberry Pi.

Get ready for Experiencing awesome the AIY kit.

"Build intelligent systems that see, speak, and understand. Then start tinkering. Take things apart, make things better. See what problems you can solve"

Vision Kit: Build an intelligent camera that can see faces, detect emotions, and recognize common objects. Create your own projects that take action based on what the Vision Kit sees.
you can try running some other demos that detect other kinds of objects with the camera. You can even install your own custom-trained TensorFlow model.

Voice Kit: With the Google Assistant built-in, build an intelligent speaker that can understand you, and respond when you ask it a question or tell it to do something. Create your own projects that use voice recognition to control robots, music, games, and more. you can try some other sample code or use the Google Cloud Speech-to-Text service, which converts spoken commands into text you can use to trigger actions in your code.

More Info
https://aiyprojects.withgoogle.com/

events.name: Online CLOUD STUDY JAM: Data Science on Google Cloud
events.description:
Watch, learn, practice
Tune into Cloud Study Jam, where Googlers will do hands-on labs and answer your questions on topics including security, managing GCP costs, and more. You'll be able to follow along through Qwiklabs at no charge. Find your timezone below and register for sessions that fit your interest.

In this session, we will work through labs in the Data Science on the Google Cloud quest on Qwiklabs.

Data Science on the Google Cloud Platform is an advanced-level quest where you will get hands-on practice on all aspects of ingestion, preparation, processing, querying, exploring and visualizing data sets using Google Cloud tools and services

Join here, Bring your community friends to watch and let's participate together.

https://cloudonair.withgoogle.com/events/study-jam-amer-april-data-science

events.name: Online CLOUD STUDY JAM Americas: Machine Learning APIs By: Googlers
events.description:
In this session, we will work through labs in the Machine Learning APIs quest on Qwiklabs.

Watch, learn, practice
Tune into Cloud Study Jam, where Googlers will do hands-on labs and answer your questions on topics including security, managing GCP costs, and more. You'll be able to follow along through Qwiklabs at no charge. Find your timezone below and register for sessions that fit your interest.

Machine Learning APIs is an advanced quest that will give you hands-on practice machine learning APIs by taking labs like Implementing an AI Chatbot with Dialogflow.

Register here, Let's work together.
https://cloudonair.withgoogle.com/events/study-jam-amer-april-ml-api

events.name: Data Science Speedrun Challenge #1: Baseline: Data, ML, AI By: Googlers
events.description:
Hello! all
Greetings from *GDG Hildesheim*
We're sure most of you are interested in learning new technologies and tools. That's why we're excited to participate in the first Community Speedrun Challenge that Google is organizing for developer communities in Europe. And as part of the GDG-Hildesheim, you're among the first to know about this!!

The Community Speedrun Challenge is a training program that will run in May where you‚Äôll have the opportunity to join four Speedruns and get hands-on experience with Machine Learning on Google Cloud and Tensorflow, and take your first steps with tools like BigQuery, Cloud Speech API, and Cloud ML Engine. Every Speedrun is open for a week to give you the ability to finish all labs in your best time, scoring more points and winning prizes.

This challenge is for those who want to gain hands on experience with Google cloud and Machine learning.

Steps to Register and win prizes

Step 1 : Register in Google events

https://events.withgoogle.com/communityspeedrunchallenge/

Step 2 : Register in Qwiklabs
https://www.qwiklabs.com/

Step 3 : Receive Confirmation and Attend the speedrun Challenge webinar along with me and then win the prices.

*Prizes*

All participants¬†that finish at least one Speedrun will get one-month free subscription to *Qwiklabs and earn a badge for each Speedrun they complete*

Top Winners from each¬†Speedrun¬†receive a *$50 voucher* for the Google Online Store

Runners-up 2-5 of each Speedrun¬†receive *$20 voucher* for the Google Online Store

*Hurry Up!!*
*
How does it work?

Each Speedrun kicks off with a Webinar by a Google trainer [masked] (GMT +02)). The Speedrun is open until Sunday the same week to give you the ability to finish all labs in your best time.

Register¬†for all Speedruns that you are interested in

Receive the access to the Speedrun as well as all information about the webinar before the Speedrun starts

Register your¬†Qwiklabs¬†account (you will need an account to participate)

Join the online webinar and learn from a Google trainer all about the Speedruns topic and finish the first lab together

Within the same week: Complete all of the labs for the Speedrun as fast as you can - you can play each of the labs up to five times to score your best time

Check out the leaderboards and see how much you scored (will be updated soon)

Receive a one-month free subscription to Qwiklabs*

Repeat for all Speedruns :D

Schedule:
Speedrun Start Dates: May 4
Webinar Time: Monday from 7 pm to 9 pm (GMT+2)

events.name: Free Online Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) Workshop. By: Googler
events.description:
Hello Everyone,
I am happy to announce that, We are co-hosting an event with "GDG-Cloud-Nuremberg"

*what we'll do*

Welcome to the free online Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) workshop (aka AMP Study Jam)!

AMP is an open-source custom web development framework created to speed up the loading time of web pages on mobile devices.

AMP can help you create fast websites more quickly! In many ways, the Internet is the central hub for the world. Every day, more people from all over the world access information online. But many don‚Äôt use the Internet on lightning-fast connections or high-powered devices. When websites are developed only for the fastest connections and devices, the experience of many users suffers.

If you‚Äôre an experienced web developer, you can create rich, fast sites with less code. If you‚Äôre a new web developer, AMP helps you learn web development. If you know some HTML and CSS, you can use AMP to make an interactive website!

Preliminary agenda:
6:00pm: Welcome
6:15pm: AMP Introduction by Ben Morss, AMP Developer Advocate at Google
6:30pm: Q&A with Ben Morss
6:45pm: Workshop "Web Development with AMP" by Ben Morss, AMP Developer Advocate at Google
7:45pm: Summary & wrap up
8:00pm: Event ends

During the webinar, feel free to join our group's slack space to discuss the matters with our community members and organizers: http://bit.ly/GDGCloudNbgSlack

Connect with us on Social Media üëç:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GDG_Hildesheim

events.name: Machine Learning Challenge 2: ML: Language Processing By: Googlers
events.description:
Details
Hello! all
Greetings from *GDG Hildesheim*
We're sure most of you are interested in learning new technologies and tools. That's why we're excited to participate in the first Community Speedrun Challenge that Google is organizing for developer communities in Europe. And as part of the GDG-Hildesheim, you're among the first to know about this!!

The Community Speedrun Challenge is a training program that will run in May where you‚Äôll have the opportunity to join four Speedruns and get hands-on experience with Machine Learning on Google Cloud and Tensorflow, and take your first steps with tools like BigQuery, Cloud Speech API, and Cloud ML Engine. Every Speedrun is open for a week to give you the ability to finish all labs in your best time, scoring more points and winning prizes.

This challenge is for those who want to gain hands on experience with Google cloud and Machine learning.

Steps to Register and win prizes

Step 1 : Register in Google events. (Don't forget to mention Group Name- GDGHildesheim)

https://events.withgoogle.com/communityspeedrunchallenge/

Step 2 : Register in Qwiklabs
https://www.qwiklabs.com/

Step 3 : Receive Confirmation and Attend the speedrun Challenge webinar along with me and then win the prices.

*Prizes*

All participants that finish at least one Speedrun will get a one-month free subscription to *Qwiklabs and earn a badge for each Speedrun they complete*

Top Winners from each Speedrun receive a *$50 voucher* for the Google Online Store

Runners-up 2-5 of each Speedrun receive *$20 voucher* for the Google Online Store

*Hurry Up!!*
*
How does it work?

Each Speedrun kicks off with a Webinar by a Google trainer [masked] (GMT +02)). The Speedrun is open until Sunday the same week to give you the ability to finish all labs in your best time.

Register for all Speedruns that you are interested in

Receive access to the Speedrun as well as all information about the webinar before the Speedrun starts

Register your Qwiklabs account (you will need an account to participate)

Join the online webinar and learn from a Google trainer all about the Speedruns topic and finish the first lab together

Within the same week: Complete all of the labs for the Speedrun as fast as you can - you can play each of the labs up to five times to score your best time

Check out the leaderboards and see how much you scored (will be updated soon)

Receive a one-month free subscription to Qwiklabs*

Repeat for all Speedruns :D
